Extract summary from list of ejamit() runs at multiple distances Get a table, one row per distance. Overall summary, not each site.

Source: R/ejamit_compare_distances.R
out_bydistance2results_bydistance.Rd

Extract summary from list of ejamit() runs at multiple distances Get a table, one row per distance. Overall summary, not each site.

Usage

out_bydistance2results_bydistance(out_bydistance)

Arguments

out_bydistance

list of tables that is output of ejamit_compare_distances_fulloutput()

Value

a table you can call results_bydistance, that is like ejamit()$results_overall, but that has 1 row per distance (radius or buffer width)

Details

This will compile a results_bydistance table from output of ejamit_compare_distances_fulloutput(), using the ejamit()$results_overall for each distance.

See also

ejamit_compare_distances() ejamit_compare_distances_fulloutput()
